projects.name: Cricket Alerts Using Python
projects.description: Developed an interactive GUI application in Python using BeautifulSoup for web scraping, delivering real-time notifications for live cricket match scores, enhancing user engagement by 30%. Enabled instant match data retrieval within 2 seconds of user interaction, achieving over 99% accuracy.

projects.name: Automated testing of the swag labs using selenium
projects.description: Automated 20+ functional test cases for the Swag Labs web application using Selenium WebDriver and TestNG, ensuring 100% test coverage and reliable execution of critical workflows. Utilized Selenium locators (ID, Name, XPath, CSS) to accurately identify web elements and executed tests across Firefox, achieving a 90% pass rate in cross-browser testing.

projects.name: Cybersecurity Awareness Training Program
projects.description: Built a scalable web-based e-learning platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask, and MySQL database, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and a 25% reduction in development time. Offered 10+ interactive modules, improving participant cybersecurity knowledge retention by 40%.

experiences.description: Analyzed and processed large datasets using Python libraries (Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Seaborn), identifying key trends and actionable insights to drive business improvements. Engineered data-driven solutions to address business challenges, leveraging data analysis skills to make informed decisions and improve overall efficiency.

Conducted a comprehensive review of over 50 scholarly articles on AI integration in Waste Management Systems. Identified AI-driven techniques that could enhance waste sorting and recycling efficiency by up to 25%, potentially reducing landfill waste by 15%.
